title: How to Create a Web Album With Photo! Web Album

steps.headline: Go to the download site and download the 10+ meg file.
Name your album.
steps.description: When the program opens, you will be asked to name an album.

steps.headline: Open, create, or save your album.
Hide or show your album settings
steps.description: Add new images to your album. Add folder with images to your album. Create a  new folder in your album.

steps.headline: Customize what your photo album will say.
Save to a folder or to your Pho.To account.
Start putting pictures in your selected album.
steps.description: This one is the 'Business Style' template. You do this by clicking on  and navigating to the correct folder.

steps.headline: Select the EXIF data option if you want to share that with your site visitors.
Publish your album.
steps.description: You can upload it to your Pho.To account or export to a selected folder.

text: Steps Go to the download site and download the 10+ meg file.  Name your album. When the program opens, you will be asked to name an album. Open, create, or save your album.  Hide or show your album settings  Add new images to your album. Add folder with images to your album. Create a  new folder in your album. Choose from many templates.  Customize what your photo album will say.  Save to a folder or to your Pho.To account.  Log onto your Pho.To account.  Construct Your Web Album Start putting pictures in your selected album. This one is the 'Business Style' template. You do this by clicking on  and navigating to the correct folder. Select the EXIF data option if you want to share that with your site visitors.  Publish your album. You can upload it to your Pho.To account or export to a selected folder.
